basics.name: Andika Leonardo
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer building user-friendly products with close attention to detail.
basics.summary: As a Full Stack Developer, I've successfully taken multiple products. I tackle tasks with enthusiasm and a commitment to excellence, whether it's adding features or fixing bugs. Currently, I work mostly with TypeScript, React, Next, Node and Tailwind. I have over 2 years of experience working remotely with clients and companies.
